definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: I found out he's talking just about a new Pokemon game.
sentences.chinese: 结果我发现他是在说最新的口袋妖怪游戏。

sentences.english: Learn how to play the Pokemon CCG in this free video lesson.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何发挥这个免费视频课程的口袋妖怪化学计算。

sentences.english: Report on the case as well as a similar case involving Pokemon.
sentences.chinese: 关于此事的报道和另一个涉及口袋妖怪的类似病例。

sentences.english: Where does dark dark road of NGC bag monster XD Jiya buy intelligent ball?
sentences.chinese: NGC口袋妖怪XD暗黑路基亚在哪里买精灵球啊？

sentences.english: Pokemon are each aligned to a kind of energy and use energy for attacks.
sentences.chinese: 口袋妖怪各自统一了攻击的能源和使用能源的种类。

sentences.english: Everything was going great but then my phone rang. It was the pokemon theme song.
sentences.chinese: 这时我的手机响了，铃声是口袋妖怪主题曲。

definition: Pokémon or Pocket Monsters, popular Japanese video game, anime and manga
Rockman or Mega Man (video game series)
Dragon Ball, Japanese manga and anime series
toy in a capsule (dispensed from a vending machine)
online/network/to connect online/to connect an electronic device to another device
